entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this morning then changing to periods of drizzle this morning and ending later this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
